Room.Name: Chambers of Apstone
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room filled with a yellowish smoke and a monotonic sound.
Room.LongDescription: The sound is mind-numbing and you cannot see anything because of the swirling haze, which seems to be a sweet smelling incense. A vague form of a man or perhaps an upright animal occasionlly appears in the room. A voice says, "mortals should not remain in this room very long." Fear makes you tremble.
